name: "nice 'n' easy"
description: For those days where love is so sure, simple, and destined, it's ok to take a leisurely stroll on the path to their heart. "nice 'n' easy" is the classic of bow ties, the quintessential black and white polka dot bow tie. Like its name, the gentleman strives to find an ease in the journey of his love, to hold steady and avoid the turmoil. "The problem now of course is to simply hold your horses. To rush would be a crime, 'cause nice and easy does it every time." 100% cotton-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon or can be purchased pre tied. To hear the songs that inspired The Brass Dance Collection, go here.

name: "the stars are ours"
description: Snatching the night and claiming it as ours to live. "the stars are ours" reminds the gentleman that he has only one life to live and bothering with dictators is a waste of time. This gold metallic and black houndstooth bow tie punches through the rules of tradition and lives up to the time of glory. "Well we're breakin' all the rules, 'cause they're getting in the way, and we'll never be as young as we are today." 100% polyester-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. Due to thickness of fabric, this bow tie can only be purchased as self tie. To hear the songs that inspired The Brass Dance Collection, go here.

name: "hey love"
description: The love game of cat and mouse, while has its moments of excitement, always has its moments of struggle, confusion, and doubt. "hey love" is for the gentleman who lusts for the fancy free personalities, but in the end just wants his love to stay securely in his heart. This floral flannel bow tie is perfect for those colder days when he longs for the warmth of his flirtatious love. "Promise the best is yet to come, oh, please tell me the truth. When will the two of us be one?" 100% cotton-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. Due to thickness of fabric, this bow tie can only be purchased as self tie. To hear the songs that inspired The Brass Dance Collection, go here.

name: "then there was you"
description: Remembering the moment right before you met the one who changed it all. "then there was you" reminds us that no matter what has happened in the past, we all can find the love that brings the sun out for good. This metallic silver jacquard bow tie is perfect for the gentleman who has already found the one who brings all the beauty he needs into his life, that the bow tie is just gravy. "Love can send you through so many things, but I'm so glad, so glad, that the sun shines every day." 100% polyester-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon or can be purchased pre tied. To hear the songs that inspired The Brass Dance Collection, go here.

name: "everything's good"
description: Looking on the days of the past, knowing that success and fame are never the goals to lead to happiness. "everything's good" is for the gentleman who keeps his head down to the grind, looking up to appreciate what he has right then and now, instead of dwelling on envy. This plaid flannel bow tie expressed the simplicity of how good things can be when focused on the right moments. "But I knew it was fly when I was just a caterpillar, that I'd make it even if I never made a milla." 100% cotton-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. Due to thickness of fabric, this bow tie can only be purchased as self tie. To hear the songs that inspired The Brass Dance Collection, go here.

name: "dames on the train"
description: An ode to the lovelies from his kind of town, stealing glances of the garden of beauties en route, falling in and out of his transit fancies. "dames on the train" is for the gentleman who knows to look but never touch unless granted. This bold red and white striped silk bow tie is a classic piece for the gentleman looking to turn the heads of dames on the train. "I want to know where they go when the doors open wide and they run of my life. Because through the course of the ride in such a short little time, I've fallen in and out of love." 100% silk-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. To hear the songs that inspired The Brass Dance Collection, go here.

name: "diamonds are forever"
description: Simplistic eye catching beauty, an endless icon of perfection, haunting the soul. "diamonds are forever" hypnotizes the gentleman longing for endless happiness. This white metallic brocade is a statement of the forever luxury the gentleman searches for. For while love may come and go, the clarity lives on. "For what good will love do me? Diamonds never lie to me, for when love's gone they'll lust on." 100% polyester-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. Due to thickness of fabric, this bow tie can only be purchased as self tie. To hear the songs that inspired The Brass Dance Collection, go here.

name: "no other love"
description: For the moments where there is only Aphrodite to soothe the soul. "no other love" is for the romantic gentleman with eyes for one love and one love only. This black and beige lace brocade bow tie oozes sensual desire. 100% polyester-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. Due to thickness of fabric, this bow tie can only be purchased as self tie. "No other kiss, no one like this, feeling that I can't resist." To hear the songs that inspired The Brass Dance Collection, go here.

name: "darling divine"
description: Pinching yourself to see if it's all dream. Alas, you're awake and your love is still there. "darling divine" is to bow tie of the gentleman who can't believe his luck, he sometimes doubts he's living real life. This delicate floral on crisp cotton voile embraces the want to be ever so careful when a true love is found. "So I wait, just waiting for a sign that your love is not only mine. I can't believe this feeling seeping out my smile, I think I'll hold onto this heart for a while." 100% cotton-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "on the road"
description: For the nomadic-at-heart, when life gets stale, it's time to pick up and start a new. "on the road" is not patriotic by mistake. For this land was born through the ideals of Manifest Destiny. The red, white, and blue flannel boldly states the need for exploration of the unknown. "I'm going down where nobody knows me, I'm going down, ain't nobody gonna know me." 100% cotton flannel-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. Due to thickness of fabric, this bow tie can only be purchased as self tie. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "glory, glory"
description: Of classical taste with hints of sorrow and grace. Patient and kind, and never doubting. "glory, glory" is a bow tie of gospel inspiration. This classical grey brocade with hints of black and white, resonating of classical culture. "We sang the songs of childhood, hymns of faith that made us strong. Ones that Mother Maybelle taught us, hear the angels sing along." 100% polyester-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. Due to thickness of fabric, this bow tie can only be purchased as self tie. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "trouble with home"
description: The need for freedom of expression can be frightening to some, but for those who live by the tips of their wings; it's the only way to live life. "the trouble with home" is the bow tie for the gentleman who is always climbing. The pale yellow and burnt sienna print on cotton poplin embraces his story. While he may return home to visit loved ones, it's only for a visit for he has higher skies to explore. 100% cotton-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "wo is i"
description: Touching on the facets of the renegade man lifestyle. Love, truth, work, youth, fear, and strength. "wo is i" embraces a rich color palette of a life to lead. This gentleman has pages to write, gospels to sing, and dreams to accomplish, shown by the variety of colors in this rich paisley silk twill. He knows the more life he can throw in, the richer the beauty. "Wo is me, wo is I. I've seen men bend and break and die." 100% silk-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "terrible"
description: Soft and sweet, fiddling selfishly. Living life naturally self-involved, striving to break free and see the eminent beauty. "terrible", despite its name, is a bow tie of refinement and delicacy. Made of a sage green floral knit, embodying the sad beauty of those who cannot see past themselves. "Life just seems so much better, when there are just fewer things to say. Because I would lay in the tall grass, next to you it'll always be ok." 100% cotton-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. Due to thickness of fabric, this bow tie can only be purchased as self tie. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "inigo montoya"
description: A quirky sense of masculinity. Devoted to the grit of commitment to a vow. "inigo montoya" embraces a navy and sky blue ikat on cotton poplin through simplicity of character. There is only one task to carry out, and this gentleman has prepared to complete it. "I got a left hand, I bought these tools, and I think like a man." 100% cotton-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "sons and daughters"
description: A stance of strength and rejuvenation. A refreshing start to a life looking ahead. "sons and daughters" is a bow tie full of the old experiences that shaped ones' strength on it's way to a new day. This burnt sienna, dusty purple, and deep brown flannel bow tie embraces the hints of cinnamon just over the horizon. "We'll make our homes under water when we build our walls of aluminum, we'll fill our mouth with cinnamon." 100% cotton flannel-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. Due to thickness of fabric, this bow tie can only be purchased as self tie. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "she has her moments"
description: A reminder to the lover that love should strong and true, never a game, and never a torture. So long as that is remembered, love can shine through. "she has her moments" reminds the gentleman that there is a difference between excitement and folly. The navy with patriotic paisley on silk twill gives the sense that the excitement of love triumphs over the toil. "She'll knock you back like a heart attack. She grew up fast, never learned how to act." 100% silk-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "further on"
description: The need for an anthem to keep on truckin' through the hills of life. And yet, sometimes the greatest journey is to show your triumphs to your home. "further on" is the bow tie for the gentleman working every day to get one step closer to his goal. The black, blue, and white plaid flannel is for the working man. He doesn't complain, he puts his nose to the grind and keeps moving along. "Smoke in the sky and fire in the air, desire burns between them. One big push is gonna get you there, it takes a stronger eye to see them." 100% cotton flannel-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. Due to thickness of fabric, this bow tie can only be purchased as self tie. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "be my stars"
description: When gazing up to the night sky, there is only one love to see. The need for love to light the way. "be my stars" is the sweet story of love displayed through midnight paisley on scarlet red silk crepe de chine. The gentleman looks to the constellations to guide himself through the dark sky to satiate his yearning heart. "I don't wanna be alone and you're the only way I can see clearly now. Be my stars when my ship is sailing." 100% silk-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "mother, when?"
description: Angst, feist, delinquency, and stubbornness. Challenges of the guardians when addressing the youth. "mother, when?" is the bow tie for the feisty son who can't help but keep a little mischief in his eye. This red and black houndstooth flannel barks at the uphill battle of discipline. Eventually, this son will listen. "Son, I need that old crow, won't you get us some. She said run, run 'til your dying day." 100% cotton flannel-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. Due to thickness of fabric, this bow tie can only be purchased as self tie. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "moonshiner"
description: Of trouble past, down a lonely road. Simple comforts come through memories and dreams. "moonshiner" speaks to glory days of the necessity of gentleman attire. This brown and black herringbone flannel bow tie fancy a look for any occasion. However, the gentleman will need to fill his flask himself. "God bless them pretty women, I wish they were all mine. They rest so sweetly, like good ole moonshine." 100% cotton flannel-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. Due to thickness of fabric, this bow tie can only be purchased as self tie. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "take me to the mountain"
description: The simplicity of natural surroundings. Embrace the mountain, riverside, night, valley, snow, mountainside, and river into the night. "take me to the mountain" is is for the gentleman of simple needs, land and water. This black and white cotton poplin bow tie embodies the beauty and simplicity of natural exploration to the one he loves. "Take me to the mountain, and wash me in the riverside, it's such a perfect place to hide away the night." 100% cotton-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "don't break the needle"
description: It's time to rock like they rocked when rock was first born. Piano thumpin', head bangin', and feet jivin'. "don't break the needle" is a bold statement to rock n' roll. The iconic skull and cross bones on cotton poplin is the statement of revolt and rebellion. An easy bow tie for the gentleman who has rock n' roll in his heart. "I've been pulling thread doin' all kinds of evil. Know ya hate me baby, but don't break the needle." 100% cotton-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "in my bed"
description: The harsh realities of a poisonous love are hard to accept. Despite all the pain, the thought of loss is the one we fear the most. "in my bed" is a strong and determined bow tie with a black ground, gold medallion, paisley silk print. This bow tie is for the man who will fight through broken bones, tears, and heart ache to keep his love. "Love, I'm not a blind man, but I will shut my eyes if it keeps you in my bed." 100% silk-dry clean only-Made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Appalachia playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "chapter black"
description: Strong with some funk, eyes with a mischievous sparkle, strut with some swagger. The boastful undertones of a gentleman on his way to impress. "chapter black", inspired by DJ Royale's first installment of his American DJ club mix, is a bow tie simply made for a fun night on the town. The basic black and white star cotton poplin makes it an easy choice to add the pop to his night. 100% cotton-dry clean only-made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "gold boots glitter"
description: To keep a comfortable life for others, there are those who risk everything to keep us safe. While some may never see the harsher points of life, loved ones of those, who have ventured to protect, know to cherish every bright moment in their day. "gold boots glitter", inspired by the Wheeler Brothers, exemplifies the hope of returning home safely into a loved one's arms. This gold metallic paisley jacquard glimmers with true American spirit and embodies the brightness in the patience of love. "So won't you wait for me, to someday see what we might finally be. Between winter's end and next year's summer smile." 100% polyester-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "my time"
description: Before life passes by, take a moment to ponder on where life is leading. This life is one for the taking, and all the credit and all the blame goes to the one leading it. Get out on the road and explore. Find a place to love and build a home. Whatever may happen, prove it to be done on one's accord. "my time", inspired by the Wheeler Brothers, is for the gentleman who knows he is here to live, and live he shall. This burgundy and sky blue, ornate paisley filled bow tie, is full of gumption and promise. Each decision is one's own and each step is toward the great dream. "Well Ive been dreamin' lately, but now, I wanna make this dirt my own. So point out the one you want girl, and Ill show you where we can grow." 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "i've been around"
description: There is always a love that can play with the mind and heart. While this love thinks it can sneak, eventually their game is exposed. This is the type of love that can educate the heart or turn the mind cold. ive been around, inspired by the Wheeler Brothers, is for the gentleman mending his broken heart by a love who never had the right intentions. The gentleman will learn from his mistakes and move to the next great love. This paisley, while somber, is full of color; showing the range of emotions love can bring. From songs that sing how my broke back is not bending enough for you. So, dont you wait on my telephone call. Ill take you letters down to the water, sink bottles to the Gulf of Mexico. 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "portraits"
description: portraits is for the gentleman who has gazed at love from both sides now, and though he doesnt understand it, knows he has to keep looking forward if he wants to find contentment. The deep red and abstract plaid of this knot are indicative of a passion that profoundly runs through the gentlemans veinsa commitment to love as it should be, not how it can lose itself to complications and selfishness. This knot is a symbol of his victory; his loyalty to the ideal for which he refuses to settle. Sand and sunny skylines used to cure the tougher days/Its funny how the weather can affect the world that way./When that junk has locked you up and a Texas ghost is not enough/I want you to think back upon the portraits of your past. 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "struggle with it all you like"
description: struggle with it all you like The roots, from which one sprouts from, stay with a person until the end of their days. There should always be honor in ones hometown, even though it was a choice made by superior guidance. struggle with it all you like, inspired by the Wheeler Brothers, is for the gentleman who shows pride in where he comes from. It does not matter if it was a city, a slum, a farm, or a cookie cutter suburb, his home has shaped him into the man who has become. This strong burgundy diamond weave jacquard represents the pride he has in the place he calls home. A constant over thinking mode, it comes and goes with every home. Oh, my whole life Ive been feeling. 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "ghost in the valley"
description: ghost in the valley is for the worldly-wise gentleman. He has ridden in, driven and scorned the bandwagon. And has come out on the other side with the strongest of commitments to and confidence in his own judgment. This dark knot is covered in a tiny motif of blue and cream, a collection a well-organized incidents on its shadowy surface. The gentleman wearing it has seen his fair share of light and darkness, and while he does not dwell in the gloom it is always present in his awareness. So think for yourself in the end, is it worth all the time we put in?/Will these spotlights and pitchforks and bibles galore?/Will these shotguns and rifles, and fences and thorns?/In the daylight will serve to regroup and keep score, in the nighttime reserve to go out and find more 100% cotton-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "yukon"
description: It's time to shake off the cobwebs, start a new day. Staying in our old patterns often does not yield the results we desire. Be brave and take that leap into the unknown. "yukon", Inspired by the Wheeler Brothers, embodies the concept of changing course by offering two prints. The royal purple cross hatch embraces the straight and steady course, reliable and comfortable. However, the black and gold paisley embraces emotion and spontaneity. Both are necessary in life, each having appropriate moments as we carry on. "Well lets attack this from an angle we have yet to try, you know how some folks get indifferent. The open minds the conduit. Were all good kids with healthy minds, we just need guidance to get by." 100% silk-dry clean only-made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "under a bridge"
description: When hard times are upon, trouble can follow, leaving one alone and bare. Running from the past into the abyss, surrounded by the cold. However, the bottom is when the despair becomes passion and weakness becomes strength. under a bridge, inspired by the Wheeler Brothers, is for the rough edged man looking towards brighter days. His past has molded him to become the strength he is today. The royal motif represents a solid platform for his evolution. While his days may have been treacherous, he builds more each day. I lost my home to all this trouble Im in. Under a bridge, shaking in the wind. 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "straight and steady"
description: There is no one way to live life. While the traditionals may dictate a desk and suit, the revolutionaries know to break free from the conformity. Freedom is everyones right, in mind, body, and spirit. straight and steady, inspired by the Wheeler Brothers, is for the innovator who cannot be tied down to the ordinary. While freedom is necessary for this innovator, one must be determined to stand strong on his path. This strong, navy and hunter, stripe exclaims the simplicity of motivation, a necessity for the great innovator. I tried, I tried to plant my feet, its hard to sing through gritted teeth. In the same key Ive been thinking, youll just maybe cut me loose. 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "you got a lot of love"
description: True and patient weaves the story of young love. With so much love to give, one should not hold back from falling in love. "you got a lot of love" embodies the simplicity and happiness of love. While some love may come and go, one should always hold onto the moments of bliss love can bring. "Dance along like I was crazy, city lights dont miss a beat. Bring back that melody baby, I sure miss steppin on your feet." 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "sleep when i'm dead'
description: On the move, cant stop until hes seen it all. Life is one big festival and he cant stop dancing throughout the streets until hes experienced it all. No time for worry, hes on the way to the next adventure. sleepy when im dead, inspired by the Wheeler Brothers, is for the gentleman with a cocked eyebrow and rapscallion smirk, always plotting his next move. This bow ties jacquard sky blue plaid weave looks classic from afar, but has a flash of interest upon a closer look. Wake up, glass of ice, aint no big surprise. I say, Oh my God, this aint my bed. 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "feeling good"
description: "It's a new dawn, a new day, it's a new life for me and I'm feeling good" This precise floral speaks to those whose days cannot be bothered by worries. With the autumn colors quickly turning, they approach the fast approaching new challenges with a relaxed confidence. The weather may be turning treacherous, but that does not deter from the motivated. This knot is 100% cotton-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "the escape"
description: Embracing love is accepting the fate that you are no longer selfishly in control of your journey. Your journey is now influenced by the loved ones who will join you. "the escape", inspired by Friendly Savages, is a lighthearted take on the many truths of love. For when you meet the one that you cannot live without, living without them is not an option. This pastel plaid is perfect for the smitten gentleman in search for love's lock. "If you know how loves the noose that you should never loose, then clap your hands. If you know how loves the lock that undoes all your knots, then clap your hands." 100% cotton-dry clean only-made in the USA Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "apple of my eye"
description: It doesn't always make sense, but when you find the one who makes you melt, there's no going back to reason. All you do know, is you need more. "apple of my eye" represents the seduction of the serpent. This black snakeskin jacquard unveils the inexplicability of why Eve had to take that bite. "I need a big bite baby, a big bite baby, of your sweet red delicious love." 100% polyester-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. Due to the thickness of the fabric, this bow tie is only available in self tie. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "head full of doubt/road full of promise"
description: Deep down you know the greatness inside you. The doubters will always be there, but it's of grave importance to push them out and let your greatness shine through. "head full of doubt/road full of promise" is for the gentleman who grew up thinking that maybe one day he could, and realized today that he is. This emerald silk paisley print embodies the truth in realizing you have what it takes to always be amazing. "There was a dream and one day I could see it. Like a bird in a cage, I broke in and demanded that somebody free it." 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "anything could happen"
description: After you've worked so hard to get here, you need to trust that not everything is up to you. There are forces outside your control, and acceptance is the first step. "anything could happen" reminds us that we don't always have everything figured out. For all the planning and worrying we put ourselves through, sometimes the best outcomes are spontaneous. This bright lightweight silk floral bow tie embodies the pleasure one can experience when they embrace instead of force. "As if we need its palette and we need its color, but now I've seen it through and now I know the truth. Anything could happen." 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "diane young"
description: Accept yourself, stay true, live in the moment. You've only got this one life to live so don't weigh it down with worry and doubt. "diane young" holds up the mirror to the gentleman and reveals his true colors. This fun floral stripe bow tie is ready for the gentleman comfortable in his skin. "Nobody knows what the future holds and it's bad enough just getting old. Live my life in self-defense, you know I love the past cuz I hate suspense." 100% cotton-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "o'galvin"
description: Lift up your spirits, indulge in spirits if need be. It's a time to celebrate and by joyful. "o'galvin" is for the gentleman who is thankful for what life has given him and knows to sing praise of his good fortunes. This daisy and grass gingham bow tie is perfect for the lad who doesn't need an excuse to celebrate. "Raise your voice and lift your glass up to the sky." 100% cotton-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "a new life"
description: He's ready to make the leap, the commitment, and he knows it's all worth it. He can't help but to sing and dance at the thought of spending the rest of his life with the one he loves. "a new life" represents the simplicity and intricacy of love in this dark teal block print. This crepe-de-chine silk bow tie is for the gentleman who knows of all he gains when he finally finds the one who brings the star dust into his life. "Babe, lets get one thing clear. There's much more star dust when you're near. I think I'm really being sincere." 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "the turnaround"
description: In every relationship there comes that point in which one questions if it's time to accept the finale or hold out for the encore. Perhaps, one just needs to try a little harder and all will be fine. Or, maybe it's time to accept one has given all they can give. "the turnaround" is the tragic beauty we must all face when we contemplate the end of a great love. This ornate silk charmeuse bow tie embodies the true pain one feels when knowing love is still there, but it's just not enough. "You stayed until, just stay until. You thought it through. The best part is over and nothing I'm feeling is new." 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "stars"
description: A broken heart runs wild in pain, in which every reminder feels like a fire suffocating every breath. The harder we fall in love, the longer those reminders feel like wounds that will never heal. "stars" is the remainder of a torn up heart, too hurt to look up towards the hope of a new. This lavender silk jacquard bow tie is a statement that the heart will eventually heal so we can look at the stars once again. "And now I'm alone in the dark of night and the moon is shining, but I can't see the light. I can't look at the stars; they make me wonder where you are." 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "falling"
description: Stop the hesitation and throw yourself off the cliff of doubt. Pump adrenaline into your sleepy soul and start your adventure. "falling" is the commitment you must make to yourself; the promise to stay true. This cotton falling floral exemplifies the beauty that one feels when they're so close to what they desire that they know they can't give up now. "Into the fire feeling higher than the truth, I'm falling. I can feel the heat but I'm not burning, but now I'm falling." 100% cotton-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "can't hold us"
description: Hit the ground running, hustle, be unstoppable. Go past the pain, the rules, the expectations. Prove the doubters wrong. "can't hold us" is the bow tie for the man who won't accept limitations. This technicolor tribal print dusts off the assumption of a conservative bow tie and brings forward a struttin' generation. "This is the moment, tonight is night, we'll fight 'til it's over. So we put our hands up like the ceiling can't hold us." 100% cotton-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "never matter"
description: Break free from the doubts. Get out of your head, and let someone else worry. "never matter" reminds us that there will always be items of worry in our life, but they usually end up being superfluous. This silk charmeuse snakeskin bow tie is for the gentleman that needs to be freed of his doubts for the enjoyment of his night on the town. "When trouble worries me and the questions never matter when it turns out to be nothing." 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "lonely boy"
description: Fallin' head over heels for a love that keeps you on the hook. And no matter how much you try to snap out of it, you can't turn away. "lonely boy" is for the gentleman manly enough to admit he's got that love that pleasantly torments him. This silk charmeuse grindy tribal bow tie reminds him that he has that inexplicable love. "Well your mama kept you, but your daddy left you, and I shoulda' done you just the same. But I came to love you, am I going to bleed? And the whole time you keep me waiting." 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "thunder clatter"
description: It's the first time you set your eyes on the love of your life. You know right then and there; it hits you like thunder. A future with your love flashes through your mind, but you commit to keeping your cool. "thunder clatter" is for the gentleman who can barely contain himself about the love of his life. This cotton sateen dark navy thunder floral bow tie explodes for when the gentleman can't. "I couldn't say what I was thinking, my heart shrinking. Two sad sparks blinking in the sun. Wait one minute, I had to listen for it. It was hidden in the fall, waiting on love to call." 100% cotton-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "i found you"
description: A love for as long as they are, for always. The type of love that is hoped, wished, prayed, and begged for. "i found you" reminds us of the love that is worth traveled for, worthy devotion. This passionate red silk jacquard bow tie embodies the bold statement of finding the one you've longed dreamed for. "I traveled a long way, and it took a long time to find you. But, I finally found you." 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "it's alright"
description: Don't let stress weigh down the soul. Devote to living your life in the direction that pleases you and let the doubters get the worry wrinkles. "it's alright" reminds us as long as we try to put our best foot forward, everything will fall in step. This patriotic butterfly bow tie wafts a fancy free life to the gentleman who needs to put a smile on his face. "Maybe we're going nowhere fast, and maybe we never even touched the gas. Alright, it's alright, it's alright, you'll see." 100% cotton-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has a 13" to 18" adjustable hook and ribbon. This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied. To listen to the Summer Medley Carnivale playlist that inspired the collection, go here.

name: "subterranean homesick blues"
description: With everything life throws at us, we just have to keep on trucking along the highway. There are times where moments will seem to be strange puzzle pieces, but it's best just to accept these pieces, as who know how they might fit into the picture later. "subterranean homesick blues" takes two different ideas to one palette. While the color palette remains loyal to blue, black and yellow, the patterns strike their differences. To reminds us while we explore the world, there will always be a piece of home with us. No matter how drastically our lives evolve. "Don't wanna be a bum, you better chew gum. The pump don't work, 'cause the vandals took the handles." 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "blue eyes blind"
description: There is the continuous search for the one who is the last piece of the puzzle. While the person may not be expected, they are the one who make colors brighter, steals a breath, and leaves one spinning for more. blue eyes blind, a compliment bow tie for Chantale Regnier's Spring/Summer 2013 Collection , is for the gentleman looking for the one to put stars in his eyes. He wants this lover to catch him by surprise, pull him in, and set him straight. This geometric print of ocean, teal, and white, is a bold statement piece for the gentleman who is not afraid of the dynamic nature of love. 100% cotton-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "big easy"
description: Keep your chin up son, women troubles is no reason to lose your cool. "big easy" tells the story of a worried young man who has lost his lady without rational reason. As his head begins to spin, he begins to lose his cool, and desperation can set in. But a gentleman remains composed, he knows that love will come and stay when it is meant to. "big easy" uses a traditional tartan plaid for composure, reliable and stable, for those days when life can get a little out of hand. Because no matter what curve ball is thrown, a gentleman has responsibilities and appearances to make. "big easy" comes to the aid of the gentleman, being the perfect knot for almost any occasion. "Somebody tell me what's going wrong. I ain't seen my baby in far too long." 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "love on top"
description: For those who have or long for that once in a lifetime love, where all you can do is yell it from the mountains, dance on the sidewalk, and sing a love song at random. This is the romance described in fairytales, present in dreams, and worth fighting for in your life. "love on top" is perfect for the loverboy who puts his true love at the top of his list. This peach floral jacquard has a soft touch, but is still of substantial weight, much like his love. While life will always have interfering priorities, he makes it a point to come back to his love despite life's distractions. "Can't you see the glow on the window pane? I can feel the sun whenever you're near. Every time you touch me I just melt away Now everybody asks me why I'm smiling out from ear to ear." 100% cotton-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "my summer daze"
description: Electrifying, static, and impulsive. Striking with every force one knows how at a chance to live. A calculated strut, gleaming eyes, and a devilish smirk, ready to strike at any moment. my summer daze, a compliment bow tie for Chantale Regnier's Spring/Summer 2013 Collection and inspired by musician Stephaun Anu's "My Summer Daze" from his Emotional Dyslexia album, is a dynamic statement of the electricity of life. This gentleman lives to conquer and surprise friends and foes. This overlapping shocking print of black, white, lime, teal, and ocean holds it own as a piece that will turn all the heads in a room. 100% cotton-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "go outside"
description: Now is the time to "go outside" and live life to its fullest. With beautiful weather comes the need for adventure, and don't deny yourself the opportunity to experience something new and wonderful. While it may be safe to stay inside, you can never really experience the world's wonders unless you venture out into its beautiful landscape. "go outside" is for those who are ready to embrace life. This cotton batiste holds an abstract floral full of happiness and spunk, ready to be worn for the next spring adventure. "I think it's good to go out, cause if you don't you'll never make a memory that will stay" 100% cotton-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "swimming"
description: Spring is here and all the bearings of the cold winter months will slowly fade away. "swimming" exemplifies the need for life transition synonymous with the change in seasons. What may have been comfortable months before, is now heavy and cumbersome. It's time to refresh oneself, release from the weight pulling down, and return back to the brisk pace of life. "swimming" possessing the qualities of the perfect spring accessory holds true to a wonderful mint cotton jacquard. Light in style, but a statement of a fresh perspective. "Your songs remind me of swimming, which I forgot when I started to sink." 100% cotton-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.

name: "fight song"
description: Back because of popular demand, "fight song" makes a return right before the holiday season! Perfect for the university gentleman soaking in the college experience with literature and friends. "fight song" embodies a black and blue plaid in silk dupioni, giving it a crisp classic feel. 100% silk-dry clean only Bow tie measures approx. 4" across, has adjustable strap with a maximum length of 19". This bow tie is available as a self tied or pre tied.
